observations.home: LCP is good (text hero). Potential CLS risk in lazy-loaded LocalReputationPanel due to inaccurate placeholder height. Unused JS is high but mostly unavoidable third-party scripts which are already deferred.
observations.condition: Uses force-static and next/image with priority (excellent).

bottleneck.description: The placeholder for the lazy-loaded `LocalReputationPanel` on the Home page had a fixed height estimate that underestimated the mobile content height (~1350px vs 1100px) and didn't account for tablet/desktop layout differences, creating a risk of layout shift (CLS) upon scroll-triggered loading.

fix.description: Refined the `LazySection` placeholder height classes in `app/page.tsx` to better match the rendered content across breakpoints.
fix.impact: Prevents layout shifts when the reputation panel loads while scrolling, maintaining visual stability.

verification.manual_steps: 1. Open Home page on Mobile (375px width). 2. Scroll down to Reputation Panel placeholder. 3. Observe smooth transition when content loads without footer jumping down.
